function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to proximity of edge and fog computing to IoT devices","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak if not mitigated","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation protocols for edge and fog computing infrastructure","Technologies":"IoT-based wearable technologies for contact tracing, remote monitoring, and hygiene compliance","People":"Users and operators of edge and fog computing infrastructure, general public in proximity to these devices","Owner":"Operators of edge and fog computing infrastructure, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and training on hygiene and sanitation protocols for edge and fog computing infrastructure","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to improper handling and maintenance of infrastructure","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive training and guidelines on hygiene and sanitation best practices for operators and users","Technologies":"Online training modules, interactive guidelines, IoT-enabled monitoring for compliance","People":"Operators and users of edge and fog computing infrastructure","Owner":"Infrastructure operators, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Dependency on cloud and IoT for data processing and communication in edge and fog computing","Impact":"Disruption of data processing and communication in the event of network outages or congestion, leading to potential delays in disease monitoring and response","Mitigation":"Implementation of redundant communication channels and decentralized data processing capabilities","Technologies":"Edge computing servers, mesh networking, backup communication protocols","People":"Operators and users of edge and fog computing infrastructure, public health authorities","Owner":"Infrastructure operators, network service providers"}]}
